Serialized Form

  • Package gate.alignment

    • Class gate.alignment.Alignment extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      3977299936398488370L

      • Serialized Fields

        • alignmentMatrix

          Map<K,V> alignmentMatrix
          a map that stores information about annotation alignment. As a key, a source annotation and as value, a set of aligned annotations to the source annotation are stored.

        • annotation2Document

          Map<K,V> annotation2Document
          For each annotation we store the information about its annotation set. This is used for letting the user know which annotation set the given annotation belongs to.

        • annotation2AS

          Map<K,V> annotation2AS
          which annotation belongs to what annotation set

      serialVersionUID:
      4755458725235429653L

      • Serialized Fields

        • outputDirectory

          URL outputDirectory
          Directory where the resulting files should be stored to.

        • directory

          File directory
          File object obtained from the outputDirectory

        • unitAlignmentFeatureName

          String unitAlignmentFeatureName
          name of the document feature that has the information about alignments of the alignment units.

        • parentOfUnitOfAlignmentFeatureName

          String parentOfUnitOfAlignmentFeatureName
          name of the document feature that has the information about alignments of the parent of the alignment units.

        • parentOfUnitOfAlignment

          String parentOfUnitOfAlignment
          annotation type that has been used as parent of unit of alignment.

        • unitOfAlignment

          String unitOfAlignment
          annotation type that has been used as unit of alignment.

        • sourceDocumentID

          String sourceDocumentID
          id of the source document

        • targetDocumentID

          String targetDocumentID
          id of the target document

        • inputASName

          String inputASName
          name of the annotation set which has annotations for the unit of alignment and parent of unit of alignment

      • Serialized Fields

        • allActions

          List<E> allActions
          a list of alignment actions available to the user

        • actions

          Map<K,V> actions
          mappings for menu item and associated alignment action

        • alignAction

          AlignAction alignAction
          default align action - i.e. what happens when user clicks on the align button

        • actionsCBMap

          HashMap<K,V> actionsCBMap
          mappings for alignment actions and its respective check box - which if checked, indicates that the respective alignment action should be executed.

        • removeAlignmentAction

          RemoveAlignmentAction removeAlignmentAction
          default unalign action - i.e. what happens when user clicks on the unalign button

        • preDisplayActions

          List<E> preDisplayActions
          list of actions that should be executed before a pair is displayed on the screen.

        • finishedAlignmentActions

          List<E> finishedAlignmentActions
          list of actions that should be executed after a user has indicated that the alignment for the given pair is finished.

        • dataPublisherActions

          List<E> dataPublisherActions
          DataPublishersActions - actions have data to publish

        • actionsMenuItemByCaption

          Map<K,V> actionsMenuItemByCaption
          mappings for menu items and their captions

    • Class gate.composite.impl.CompositeDocumentImpl extends gate.corpora.DocumentImpl implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -1379936764549428131L

      • Serialized Fields

        • combiningMethod

          CombiningMethod combiningMethod
          CombiningMethod that was used for creating this document.

        • offsetMappings

          HashMap<K,V> offsetMappings
          A Map that contains offet mappings. This is used for copying and removing annotations to the respective documents.

        • combinedDocumentIds

          Set<E> combinedDocumentIds
          Set of ids of combined documents.

        • compoundDocument

          CompoundDocument compoundDocument
          The compound document which the current composite document belongs to.

        • disableListener

          boolean disableListener
          When a new annotation is added to the composite document, this parameter tells whether the annotation copying and deletion to their respective documents should be carried out or not.

    • Class gate.composite.impl.SegmentProcessingPR extends gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      8528040629940314055L

      • Serialized Fields

        • analyser

          gate.LanguageAnalyser analyser
          Controller that should be used to process segments.

        • segmentAnnotationType

          String segmentAnnotationType
          annotation type that the segment is annotated with.

        • segmentAnnotationFeatureName

          String segmentAnnotationFeatureName
          Only the annotation that has the specified feature should be considered for annotating.

        • segmentAnnotationFeatureValue

          String segmentAnnotationFeatureValue
          Only the annotation that has the feature specified as segmentAnnotationFeatureName with the value of segmentAnnotaitonFeatureValue then only the annotation is considered for annotating.

        • inputASName

          String inputASName
          Annotation set that contains the segment annotation and the annotations to be copied to the composite document.

        • debug

          boolean debug

  • Package gate.compound.impl

    • Class gate.compound.impl.AbstractCompoundDocument extends gate.corpora.DocumentImpl implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -8456893608311510260L

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject

          private void readObject(ObjectInputStream stream)
                 throws IOException,
                        ClassNotFoundException
          Overridden to properly register component documents with the creole register when this compound is deserialized.
          Throws:
          IOException
          ClassNotFoundException

      • Serialized Fields

        • encoding

          String encoding
          The encoding of the source of the document content

        • collectRepositioningInfo

          Boolean collectRepositioningInfo
          If you set this flag to true the repositioning information for the document will be kept in the document feature.
          Default value is false to avoid the unnecessary waste of time and memory

        • preserveOriginalContent

          Boolean preserveOriginalContent
          If you set this flag to true the original content of the document will be kept in the document feature.
          Default value is false to avoid the unnecessary waste of memory

        • documentIDs

          List<E> documentIDs
          Languages

        • sourceUrl

          URL sourceUrl
          The source URL

        • currentDocument

          gate.Document currentDocument
          Curent Document

        • documents

          Map<K,V> documents
          Available documents

        • sourceUrlStartOffset

          Long sourceUrlStartOffset
          The start of the range that the content comes from at the source URL (or null if none).

        • sourceUrlEndOffset

          Long sourceUrlEndOffset
          The end of the range that the content comes from at the source URL (or null if none).

        • markupAware

          Boolean markupAware
          Is the document markup-aware?

        • CURR_DOC_NOT_SET_MSG

          String CURR_DOC_NOT_SET_MSG
          exception message when the current document is not set
